data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gomes, Suzete Rodrigues, Picanço, Juliane Bentes, Veitenheimer, Inga L., Mendes, Thomé, José Willibaldo (2006): A new species of Simrothula (Gastropoda, Soleolifera, Veronicellidae) from Northern Brazil. Zootaxa 1329: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174184
